ctx: intros m0 m1 a b H.
tactic: rewrite <- (lem_get_leb m0 m1 a b) with (b0 := b).

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b : bool), lem m0 m1 -> lem (map_replace bool m0 a b) (map_replace bool m1 a b)

Premises:
ad = N : Set
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
map_replace : forall A : Set, Map A -> ad -> A -> Map A
lem = fix lem (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Prop := match m0 with | @M0 _ => match m1 with | @M0 _ => True | _ => False end | @M1 _ a b => match m1 with | @M1 _ a' b' => if (a =? a')%N then leb b b' else False | _ => False end | @M2 _ a b => match m1 with | @M2 _ c d => lem a c /\ lem b d | _ => False end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Prop
lem_get_leb : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b0 b1 : bool), lem m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some b0 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some b1 -> leb b0 b1
lem_domain_equal : forall m0 m1 : Map bool, lem m0 m1 -> domain_equal bool bool m0 m1
lemd = fun (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) => ensemble_base state d m0 /\ ensemble_base state d m1 /\ lem m0 m1 : preDTA -> mRelation bool
map_or_mapget_true_r : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m1 m0) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_l : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
lemd_antisymmetric : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool), lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d m1 m0 -> m0 = m1
lem_transitive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y z : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y z -> lem x0 z) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => forall z : Map bool, lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 z -> lem (M0 bool) z) (fun z : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun z0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) -> lem (M0 bool) z0 -> lem (M0 bool) z0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => I) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool)) (H0 : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) => False_ind (lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) H0) (...
map_or_mapget_true_rd : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
lem_antisymmetric = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y x0 -> x0 = y) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = y0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => eq_refl) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (H : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) (_ : lem (M1 bool a a0) (M0 bool)) => False_ind (M0 bool = M1 bool a a0) H) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m -> lem m (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m) (m0 : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m0 -> lem m...
map_or_mapget_true_inv : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true \/ MapGet bool m1 a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_replace_mapget_ins_true_0 : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (b : bool), MapGet bool m a = Some b -> MapGet bool (map_replace bool m a true) a = Some true
lemd_transitive : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 m2 : Map bool), lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d m1 m2 -> lemd d m0 m2
map_or_def_ok : forall m0 m1 : Map bool, domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> domain_equal bool bool m0 (map_or m0 m1)
map_or_inc_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map bool), lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d m2 m3 -> lemd d (map_or m0 m2) (map_or m1 m3)
map_or_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> ensemble_base state d (map_or m0 m1)
lattice_bounded_5 : forall (p : prechain bool) (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p)
map_or_inc_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m m0 m1 : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m -> lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d (map_or m0 m) (map_or m1 m)
predta_coacc_0_incr : forall (d d' : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool), lemd d' m0 m1 -> lemd d (predta_coacc_0 d d' m0) (predta_coacc_0 d d' m1)
domain_equal_symmetric : forall (A B : Set) (m0 : Map A) (m1 : Map B), domain_equal A B m0 m1 -> domain_equal B A m1 m0
lattice_bounded_def_0 = fun p : prechain bool => forall (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p) : prechain bool -> Prop
map_replace_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (x : bool), ensemble_base state d m -> ensemble_base state d (map_replace bool m a x)
map_or_inc_rd : forall (d : preDTA) (m m0 m1 : Map bool), ensemble_base state d m -> lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d (map_or m m0) (map_or m m1)
lem_reflexive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => lem x0 x0) I (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) => eq_ind_r (fun b : bool => if b then leb a0 a0 else False) (leb_reflexive a0) (N.eqb_refl a)) (fun (m : Map bool) (H : lem m m) (m0 : Map bool) (H0 : lem m0 m0) => conj H H0) x : r_reflexive bool lem
domain_equal_transitive : forall (A0 A1 A2 : Set) (m0 : Map A0) (m1 : Map A1) (m2 : Map A2), domain_equal A0 A1 m0 m1 -> domain_equal A1 A2 m1 m2 -> domain_equal A0 A2 m0 m2

```coq
intros m0 m1 a b H.
simpl.
rewrite <- (lem_get_leb m0 m1 a b) with (b0 := b).
rewrite <- (lem_get_leb m0 m1 a true) with (b0 := true).
apply lem_transitive with (y := m1).
apply H.
apply lem_reflexive.
Qed.
```
